column4: i installed php 5.3 in karmic using the dotdeb repos, but i am unable to install php5-mcrypt because: trying to install tells me: php5-mcrypt: Depends: libltdl3 (>= 1.5.2-2) but it is not installable
trying to install libltdl3 tells me: php5-mcrypt: Depends: libltdl3 (>= 1.5.2-2) but it is not installable
You'll need to ask the dotdeb peopl.
We cannot support their stuff here.
